Name: MONOLISK
About the game: Raid a gazillion handcrafted dungeons, collect loot and creature cards and build your own dungeons for others! MONOLISK is a fantasy ARPG, CCG and dungeon builder in a single package. Build dungeons, share them with your followers, gear up your heroes and clear levels built by your friends! * Clear heaps of dungeons in an online hack 'n' slash RPG * Collect cards with equipment, abilities, creatures and environments * Customize your 5 heroes with various playstyles * Design unique levels for your friends and followers * Craft new cards and expand your collection * Tell your own stories * Help others rebuild the shattered world of MONOLISK!
Meta Title: MONOLISK: Feb 4, 2021, Trickster Arts and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on MONOLISK? Check out the release date (Feb 4, 2021), developer insights from Trickster Arts, and a complete game summary.
